rows.label: qev010102_MSG0001
rows.name:
Will you not procure the car parts for me, [ST:gender p1=hero p2=heroine ]?
I'm eager to repair this mess, but even more eager
to learn about you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010102_MSG0002
rows.name:
I knew you'd accept! You're the type to always say yes,
no matter how absurd the request may be.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010102_MSG0003
rows.name:
It's because you're an agent of justice!
Such things are in your DNA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010102_JNK0010
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev010102_SEL0011
rows.name: Puff up your chest and agree vehemently.

rows.label: qev010102_JNK0020
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: qev010102_SEL0021
rows.name: Shake your head and admit that you're no [ST:gender p1=hero p2=heroine ].

rows.label: qev010102_MSG0004
rows.name:
I like the cut of your jib! It takes that sort of
determination to tackle each new evil that arises.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010102_MSG0005
rows.name:
The classic [ST:gender p1=hero p2=heroine ] response—bold of action,
yet humble of spirit. One such as yourself would
never brag about your derring-do![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010102_MSG0006
rows.name:
In any case, what I need is a pair of anhydrous
radiators. Got it? Thanks a million, [ST:gender p1=hero p2=heroine ]![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010102_MSG0007
rows.name:
I love movies and comics about [ST:gender p1=heroes p2=heroines ] such as
yourself. I've dreamed of meeting one ever since
I was a child.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010102_MSG0008
rows.name:
And here you are, in the flesh! You actually came to
my rescue! How unbelievable is that?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010102_MSG0009
rows.name:
Er, so, after you get those anhydrous radiators,
could we maybe talk for a while?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010102_MSG0034
rows.name:
I want to know more about you. Perhaps hear tales
of your mighty exploits and so forth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010102_MSG0010
rows.name:
So, I was thinking... A [ST:gender p1=hero p2=heroine ] needs a strong,
overriding will.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010102_MSG0011
rows.name:
You must have some deep, personal motive for hating
evil, yes?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010102_MSG0012
rows.name:
Wait! Let me guess! They killed your parents before
your very eyes! No, wait... You were bitten by a
radioactive scirpo![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010102_JNK0030
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: qev010102_SEL0031
rows.name: Admit that you have an intense secret motive.

rows.label: qev010102_JNK0040
rows.name: Deny

rows.label: qev010102_SEL0041
rows.name: Laugh it off and downplay the notion.

rows.label: qev010102_MSG0013
rows.name:
Aha! I knew it! You're so close to my vision of the
ideal [ST:gender p1=hero p2=heroine ]![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010102_MSG0014
rows.name:
I see... Then perhaps the fight for justice needs
no reason.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010102_MSG0015
rows.name: Maybe I was overcomplicating things a bit.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010102_MSG0016
rows.name:
This is why I wanted to talk. It feels as if my ideal
[ST:gender p1=hero p2=heroine ] is becoming more real before my very eyes![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010102_MSG0017
rows.name:
You'll pass through all the trials laid forth before you!
Overcome every craven trap! Weather each tragedy![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010102_MSG0018
rows.name:
And then, in the grand finale, everyone—even your
erstwhile tormentors—will come together to sing
your mighty praises![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010102_MSG0019
rows.name:
I've stripped all the unnecessary details away to create
the perfect morality tale, and I love it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010102_MSG0020
rows.name:
The whole reason I enlisted with the BLADEs was to find
this story.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010102_MSG0021
rows.name:
I'd given up hope of becoming a hero myself, but I
knew one would come along eventually. I just KNEW it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010102_JNK0050
rows.name: Show Gratitude

rows.label: qev010102_SEL0051
rows.name: Thank Justin for his praise.

rows.label: qev010102_JNK0060
rows.name: Show Parts

rows.label: qev010102_SEL0061
rows.name: Remind Justin that you brought the car parts he wanted.

rows.label: qev010102_MSG0022
rows.name:
Oh, pishposh! I'm just stating the truth. Now then,
did you get those anhydrous radiators I asked about?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010102_MSG0023
rows.name:
Oh, right! I got a bit lost in myself there.
Almost forgot I'd asked for those anhydrous radiators![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010102_MSG0035
rows.name: So how did it go? Did you find everything?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010102_MSG0024
rows.name: Perfect. I'll have my auto fixed up in no time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010102_MSG0025
rows.name:
You've given me so much more than car parts today,
[ST:gender p1=hero p2=heroine ]. Please accept this as my way of saying thanks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010102_MSG0026
rows.name:
And if you should come across anyone else in need,
be sure to lend them a hand. You're a paragon of
justice for us all now![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010102_JNK0070
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev010102_SEL0071
rows.name: Salute and agree wholeheartedly.

rows.label: qev010102_JNK0080
rows.name: Evade

rows.label: qev010102_SEL0081
rows.name: Skirt the issue with a noncommittal response.

rows.label: qev010102_MSG0027
rows.name:
With BLADEs such as you on patrol, the people of
New LA have nothing to fear.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010102_MSG0028
rows.name:
How bold of you! For a true [ST:gender p1=hero p2=heroine ] is unwilling to
make a promise [ST:gender p1=he p2=she ] might not be able to keep![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010102_MSG0029
rows.name:
But alas, you are a BLADE. And a time will come
when you have to fight for this fair city.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010102_MSG0030
rows.name: Anyway, I should probably get going.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010102_MSG0031
rows.name:
I am a BLADE, after all. Nothing impressive like you,
of course, but a fellow seeker of justice nonetheless.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010102_MSG0032
rows.name:
I don't know when I'll see you again, but I feel the
hand of fate at work in our meeting.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010102_MSG0033
rows.name:
As long as you continue to walk the path of justice,
our destinies are intertwined. When we meet again,
let it be as comrades in battle![ST:wait ]
